thread.title: April
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by April

author: April
title: April
text: For as select auto I've had one problem where idk what happens but someone there wouldn't let me tranfer the insurance from my truck to my car but neatly to say Linda Cole got it all strighted out for me and I'm very thankful for that and as a person out of 1 to 10 I rate her as a 10. @ as for the company it's a good place to go to receive any kind of insurance it's very cheap for 6 months here it's like paying one to two months else where. But I like select goute. You don't know what your missing. My best freinds recommend me and I tell you what I'd never switch back it's fast easy any cheap.... and I recommend Linda Cole if you can get her but if not most of the rest are just as good. Thank you select Quote: team.
